resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103441</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103441</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204641</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Traveling Through Africa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reisen Durch Afrika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déplacement Par l'Afrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Viajar Através De África</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attraversando Through L'Africa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδι μέσω της Αφρικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Viajar A través De África</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will plan a one-week, three country trip through Africa and create a travelogue of places they will visit. The students will create an electronic scrapbook of highlights of the trip (including cultural highlights, historical points of interest, geographic features, etc.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer planen ein einwöchiges, die Reise 
mit drei Ländern durch Afrika und erstellen ein travelogue der 
Plätze, die sie besichtigen. Die Kursteilnehmer stellen einen 
elektronischen Scrapbook der Höhepunkte der Reise her 
(einschließlich kulturelle Höhepunkte, historische Punkte des 
Interesses, geographische Merkmale, usw..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants projetteront un d'une semaine, le 
voyage de trois pays par l'Afrique et créeront un documentaire de voyage des 
endroits qu'ils visiteront. Les étudiants créeront un album 
électronique des points culminants du voyage (points culminants 
culturels y compris, points historiques d'intérêt, dispositifs 
géographiques, etc...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes planearão um one-week, um desengate
de três países através de África e criarão um travelogue dos 
lugares que visitarão. Os estudantes criarão um scrapbook 
eletrônico dos destaques do desengate (destaques cultural including, 
pontos históricos do interesse, características geográficas, etc..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi progetteranno un di una settimana, un 
viaggio dei tre paesi attraverso l'Africa e creeranno un travelogue 
dei posti che visiteranno. Gli allievi creeranno un album 
elettronico dei punti culminanti del viaggio (punti culminanti 
culturali compresi, punti storici di interesse, caratteristiche 
geografiche, ecc.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα προγραμματίσουν έναν μίας εβδομάδας,
το ταξίδι τριών χωρών μέσω της Αφρικής και θα δημιουργήσουν μια 
ταξιδιωτική περιγραφή των θέσεων που θα επισκεφτούν. Οι 
σπουδαστές θα δημιουργήσουν ένα ηλεκτρονικό λεύκωμα αποκομμάτων 
των κυριώτερων σημείων του ταξιδιού (συμπεριλαμβανομένων των 
πολιτιστικών κυριώτερων σημείων, των ιστορικών σημείων 
ενδιαφέροντος, των γεωγραφικών χαρακτηριστικών γνωρισμάτων, 
κ.λπ....)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes planearán un one-week, viaje de 
tres países a través de África y crearán un travelogue de lugares 
que visitarán. Los estudiantes crearán un libro de recuerdos 
electrónico de los toques de luz del viaje (toques de luz culturales 
incluyendo, las puntas históricas del interés, las características 
geográficas, los etc.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:REN BRYAN
FN:REN BRYAN
VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103441</entry>
